casebody.data:
Christopher MILLER, an individual, and Christopher Miller and Lindsay Miller as trustees of the C & L Miller Revocable Trust, Plaintiffs Below, Appellants,
v.
HCP TRUMPET INVESTMENTS, LLC, Hispania Private Equity II, L.P., Hispania Investors II LLC, Carlos Signoret, Jason Shafer, Mark Russell, and Victor Maruri, Defendants Below, Appellees. No. 107, 2018 Supreme Court of Delaware.

Submitted: September 12, 2018
Decided: September 20, 2018
Reargument Denied October 9, 2018

AFFIRMED.
